help-file.title: WIGHT
help-file.content:
Wights are a race of undead creatures that appear to be a cross between a zombie and a skeleton. A wight is about the same height as an ogre but without as much mass, they are extremely strong and are fearsome foes in battle.
Class list: Warrior. Statistics: Extremely strong, huge in size and are fairly agile and dexterous. Innate abilities: Ultravision, Stone skin, Doorbash, Magical resistances.
